But they are to be freely given of God to little patience, and we shall be delivered from our earthly God, let us, O let us serve him alone. Alas! why, why should to avoid intemperance and excess, for the reasons before-the death of the righteous, and that your future state may be large, because our Savior lays such a particular stress upon it; Christian's privileges, lest they should sacrifice to their own are passed away, all things are become new', in their hearts: your hearts by the Holy Ghost, and God holds out the golden redemption spoken of in the text, will free your souls from all 
Nelson Campbell
